instance_template: cpu("X9"). cpu("ZetaCore"). cpu("Alpha8"). gpu("QuasarRTX"). gpu("NovaX"). gpu("GammaGTX"). storage("UltraSSD"). storage("FusionDrive"). storage("MegaHDD"). cost("X9", 300). cost("ZetaCore", 500). cost("Alpha8", 450). cost("QuasarRTX", 700). cost("NovaX", 600). cost("GammaGTX", 450). cost("UltraSSD", 250). cost("FusionDrive", 300). cost("MegaHDD", 200). perf("X9", 95). perf("ZetaCore", 120). perf("Alpha8", 110). perf("QuasarRTX", 130). perf("NovaX", 125). perf("GammaGTX", 90). perf("UltraSSD", 100). perf("FusionDrive", 95). perf("MegaHDD", 60).
generator: 1 { selected(C) : cpu(C) } 1. 1 { selected(G) : gpu(G) } 1. 1 { selected(S) : storage(S) } 1.

hard_constraints.description: Sanity check: make sure the most expensive part you picked is actually the performance leader of the pack.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected(X), cost(X, CX), MX = #max { V : selected(I), cost(I, V) }, CX = MX, perf(X, PX), MP = #max { V : selected(I), perf(I, V) }, PX < MP.

hard_constraints.description: Don't go overboard; picking the absolute best of everything is frowned upon.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected(C), cpu(C), M1 = #max { P : cpu(X), perf(X, P) }, perf(C, M1), selected(G), gpu(G), M2 = #max { P : gpu(X), perf(X, P) }, perf(G, M2), selected(S), storage(S), M3 = #max { P : storage(X), perf(X, P) }, perf(S, M3).

hard_constraints.description: GPU can't be outrunning the CPU, that's just common sense.
hard_constraints.asp_rule: :- selected(G), gpu(G), selected(C), cpu(C), perf(G, PG), perf(C, PC), PG > PC.

hard_constraints.description: The BIOS on Alpha8 is a mess, so NovaX is a no-go with that chip.
FusionDrive is picky, it'll only work if you've got a ZetaCore CPU in there.

soft_constraints.description: Management wants costs to be balanced, so try to keep the gaps between parts under $250.
soft_constraints.asp_rule: penalty("cost_imbalance", (C1, C2), 1) :- selected(C1), selected(C2), cost(C1, V1), cost(C2, V2), V1 > V2 + 250.

global_objective: #minimize { Cost, Name, Tuple : penalty(Name, Tuple, Cost) }.
